advancements.mekanismgenerators.burn_the: Craft a Gas-Burning Generator to burn Ethene
advancements.mekanismgenerators.heat_gen: Craft a Heat Generator to start making power
advancements.mekanismgenerators.wind_gen: Hopefully there is some wind nearby
configuration.mekanismgenerators.gear.me: Geothermal charging rate in Joules per tick, per degree above ambient, per upgrade installed. This value scales down based on how much of the MekaSuit Pants is submerged. Fire is treated as having a temperature of ~200K above ambient, lava has a temperature of 1,000K above ambient.
Percent of heat damage negated by MekaSuit Pants with maximum geothermal generator units installed. This number scales down linearly based on how many units are actually installed.
Amount of fuel (mB) that each assembly contributes to the fuel and waste capacity. Max = fuelAssemblies * maxFuelPerAssembly
The burn rate increase each fuel assembly provides. Max Burn Rate = fuelAssemblies * burnPerAssembly
The default burn rate of the fission reactor.
The heat capacity added to a Fission Reactor by a single casing block. Increase to require more energy to raise the reactor temperature.
Amount of cooled coolant (mB) that each block of the fission reactor contributes to the volume. Max = volume * cooledCoolantPerTank
Amount of heated coolant (mB) that each block of the fission reactor contributes to the volume. Max = volume * heatedCoolantPerTank
The percentage of waste in a fission reactor's output waste tank that is necessary to trigger the excess waste.
Amount of energy created (in heat) from each whole mB of fission fuel.
The chance of a catastrophic meltdown occurring once the reactor's damage passes 100%. This will linearly scale as damage continues increasing passed 100%.
Percent damage that a reactor will start at after being reconstructed after a meltdown.

Whether catastrophic meltdowns can occur from Fission Reactors. If this is disabled, instead of melting down the reactor will force turn itself off and not be able to be turned back on until the damage level has returned to safe levels.
How much radioactivity of fuel/waste contents are multiplied during a meltdown.
The radius of the explosion that occurs from a meltdown.
Settings for configuring Fission Reactor Meltdowns.
The average surface area of a Fission Reactor's fuel assemblies to reach 100% boil efficiency. Higher values make it harder to cool the reactor.
Amount of energy (Joules) the fusion reactor can store.
Amount of fuel (mB) that the fusion reactor can store.
The fraction of heat from the casing that can be transferred to all sources that are not water. Will impact max heat, heat transfer to thermodynamic conductors, and power generation.
Affects the Injection Rate, Max Temp, and Ignition Temp.
Amount of steam (mB) per injection rate that the fusion reactor can store. Max = injectionRate * steamPerInjection
Amount of water (mB) per injection rate that the fusion reactor can store. Max = injectionRate * waterPerInjection
The fraction of the heat dissipated from the case that is converted to Joules.
The fraction of the heat from the casing that is dissipated to water when water cooling is in use. Will impact max heat, and steam generation.
Energy produced by the Bio Generator in Joules/t.
The capacity in mB of the fluid tank in the Bio Generator.
The number of ticks each mB of Ethene burns for in the Gas-Burning Generator.
Multiplier for calculating the energy density of Ethene (1 mB Hydrogen + 2 * bioGeneration * densityMultiplier).
The capacity in mB of the chemical tank in the Gas-Burning Generator.
The amount of lava in mB that gets consumed to transfer heatGeneration Joules to the Heat Generator.
Multiplier of effectiveness of Lava that is adjacent to the Heat Generator.
Add this amount of Joules to the energy produced by a heat generator if it is in an 'ultrawarm' dimension, in vanilla this is just the Nether.

Amount of energy in Joules the Heat Generator produces per tick. heatGeneration + heatGenerationLava * lavaSides + heatGenerationNether. Note: lavaSides is how many sides are adjacent to lava, this includes the block itself if it is lava logged allowing for a max of 7 "sides".
The capacity in mB of the fluid tank in the Heat Generator.
Peak energy generation in Joules/t for the Advanced Solar Generator. Note: It can go higher than this value in some extreme environments.
Peak energy generation in Joules/t for the Solar Generator. Note: It can go higher than this value in some extreme environments.

The maximum Y value that affects the Wind Generators Power generation. This value gets clamped at the world's logical height. For example for worlds like the nether that are 256 blocks tall, but have a ceiling at 128 blocks, this would be clamped at 128.
Maximum energy generation in Joules/t that the Wind Generator can produce.
The minimum Y value that affects the Wind Generators Power generation. This value gets clamped at the world's minimum height.
Minimum energy generation in Joules/t that the Wind Generator can produce.
Rate in mB/t at which Hohlraum can accept D-T Fuel.
The number of Turbine Blades supported by each Electromagnetic Coil.
Amount of chemical (mB) that each block of the turbine's steam cavity contributes to the volume. Max = volume * chemicalPerTank
Amount of energy in Joules that each block of the turbine contributes to the total energy capacity. Max = volume * energyCapacityPerVolume
The rate in mB/t at which steam is condensed into water in the turbine.
The rate in mB/t at which steam is dispersed into the turbine.
The rate in mB/t at which steam is vented into the turbine.
configuration.mekanismgenerators.storage: Base energy storage in Joules of: Advanced Solar Generator
Base energy storage in Joules of: Bio-Generator
Base energy storage in Joules of: Heat Generator
Base energy storage in Joules of: Solar Generator
Base energy storage in Joules of: Wind Generator
description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: An advanced generator that directly absorbs the sun's rays with little loss to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.bio_gener: A generator that burns organic materials of the world to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.control_r: A collection of control rods used to halt a fission chain reaction. Placed on top of a tower of Fission Fuel Assemblies.
description.mekanismgenerators.electroma: A block that converts kinetic energy from a Rotational Complex into usable electricity. These can be placed in any arrangement above your Rotational Complex, as long as they are all touching each other and the complex itself.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_f: A cluster of fuel rods used to house fission fuel within a Fission Reactor. These can be stacked on top of each other.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r: Lead-infused steel casing used to create a Fission Reactor. Mostly heat-resistant, mostly radiation-resistant, and mostly safe!
A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with redstone.
A port which can be placed on a Fission Reactor multiblock to transfer coolant, fuel, and waste.
description.mekanismgenerators.fusion_re: The controlling block for the entire Fusion Reactor structure.
Reinforced framing that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
A block that can be used to allow basic monitoring of a reactor using redstone.
A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: A generator that harnesses the varying molecular gases to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.geotherma: Harnesses geothermal energy from the surrounding environment, and improves protection against damage from heat sources. Install multiple for faster charging and greater protection.
description.mekanismgenerators.heat_gene: A generator that uses the heat of lava or other burnable resources to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Fusion Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: Activate the reactor when powered, and deactivate when unpowered
Output when the reactor's core heat capacity has been met
Output when the reactor has reached a critical level of waste (%1$s)
Output when the reactor reaches critical damage levels (100%+).
Output when the reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Output when the reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
Output when the reactor reaches dangerous temperatures
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fission Reactor and Fusion Reactor multiblocks (as well as any others!).
description.mekanismgenerators.rotationa: A connector that is placed on the highest Turbine Rotor of an Industrial Turbine to carry kinetic energy into its Electromagnetic Coils.
description.mekanismgenerators.saturatin: A block that condenses steam processed by an Industrial Turbine into reusable water. These can be placed in any arrangement above your rotational complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_gen: A generator that uses the power of the sun to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_rec: Harnesses the power of the sun to charge your MekaSuit. Install multiple for faster charging.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_c: Pressure-resistant casing used in the creation of an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_r: The steel rod that is used to house Turbine Blades within an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_v: A type of Turbine Casing that includes a port for the transfer of energy and steam.
A type of Turbine Casing with an integrated vent for the release of steam. These should be placed on the level of or above the turbine's Rotational Complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.wind_gene: A generator that uses the strength of the wind to produce energy, with greater efficiency at higher levels.
fission.mekanismgenerators.force_disable: Reactor must reach safe damage and temperature levels before it can be reactivated.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, improper placement for Control Rod Assembly at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_f: Couldn't form, missing fuel assembly for control rod at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_extra: Couldn't form, found extra Control Rod Assembly at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, invalid Fission Fuel Assembly placement at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no fuel assembly structures present.
fission.mekanismgenerators.missing_contr: Couldn't form, missing control rod for fuel assembly at %1$s.
mekanismgenerators.configuration.title: Mekanism: Generators Config
Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to: %1$s.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Rotational Complex at %1$s. Complex must be centered above Turbine Rotors.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r: Couldn't form, found invalid Turbine Rotor at %1$s. Turbine Rotors must be centered below Rotational Complex.
Couldn't form, invalid Turbine Rotor arrangement.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_conde: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Saturating Condenser at %1$s. Saturating Condensers must be above Pressure Disperser layer.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_even_: Couldn't form, width and length of structure must be odd.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, Electromagnetic Coil arrangement is malformed. Coils must be connected to Rotational Complex and adjacently connected.
Couldn't form, Pressure Disperser arrangement is malformed. Dispersers must create complete horizontal layer surrounding Rotational Complex.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no blades are present on the Turbine Rotor.
Couldn't form, no Electromagnetic Coils present.
Couldn't form, no Rotational Complex present.
Couldn't form, expected but didn't find Pressure Disperser at %1$s.
Couldn't form, no Pressure Dispersers present.
Couldn't form, no Turbine Vents present.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_too_n: Couldn't form, structure is too narrow to support turbine size.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_vent_: Couldn't form, found a Turbine Vent below Pressure Disperser layer. Vents must be at or above vertical position of disperser layer.
